title: Statistical optimization of cell-hydrogel interactions for green microbiology – a tutorial review
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00400K, Tutorial Review

Conor G. Harris, Willie E. Rochefort, Lewis Semprini, Kaitlin Fogg
In this tutorial mini-review, we explore the application of Design of Experiments (DOE) as a powerful statistical tool in biotechnology. Specifically, we review the optimization of hydrogel materials for diverse...
